Cuneify REPL

A Read Eval Print Loop for Cuneiform

Type ASCII Transliteration Format (ATF) notation in the left editor and it will be transformed into cuneiform characters on the right.

Sample ATF syntax: 

{f}KURUN.NA szu-a-ti u2-ka-an-nu-szi-ma a-na me#-e i-na#-[ad-du]-u2-szi

Shareable permalink:

This page is based on the Cuneify project source code by Steve Tinney and Tom Gillam. It has been ported to client-side JavaScript by Jon Knowles
